name: Energy-Flow Cosmology Site Graph
description: High-level semantic map of the Energy-Flow Cosmology ecosystem: theory, validation, meta, cognition, symbiosis and semantic graph layers.

dataset.name: EFC Formal Theory
dataset.description: Formal specification of Energy-Flow Cosmology, including EFC-D, EFC-S, s0–s1 dynamics and observables.

dataset.name: EFC Core Models (Code)
dataset.description: Python implementations of Energy-Flow Cosmology cores, including potentials, entropy fields and validation utilities.

dataset.name: Validation and Empirical Checks
dataset.description: Validation figures, datasets and scripts for SPARC, JWST, DESI BAO, lensing and related tests.

dataset.name: Schema and Concept Graph
dataset.description: Schema.org-based semantic graph for authorship, concepts, methodology and site integration.

dataset.name: Meta Layer
dataset.description: Meta-architecture, metascope, topology of insight and meta-reflective protocol for EFC.

dataset.name: Cognition Layer
dataset.description: Cognitive mechanics of the human field: entropy–clarity inversion, transient high-order states and s0–s1 transitions.

dataset.name: Symbiosis Layer
dataset.description: Human–model symbiosis, vector alignment, resonance and co-field formation.

dataset.name: Reflection Layer
dataset.description: Reflection logs, resonance links and state-maps describing the evolution of the theory and process.

dataset.name: Meta-Knowledge Graph
dataset.description: JSON-LD meta-graph connecting human field, model engine, co-field, metascope, co-field simulator and repository map.

dataset.name: Repository Structure Map
dataset.description: Interactive and semantic map of the full repository topology.

dataset.name: Personal Note
dataset.description: Context, cognitive style and motivation behind the open documentation of EFC and the meta-process.
